Extremely Enjoyable Puzzle Game. Easy enough to not get lost constantly, hard enough to still be engaging, extra challenges are still available and the game has achievements that promote beating the game at least 2 times. 10/10. still playing it to fully complete!

Al principio puede parecer un poco pesado para algunos el estar resolviendo puzzles constantemente, pero conforme avanza el juego dejas de fijarte en esto y te fijas más en aspectos como la historia y lo qué pasó en el pasado.
Sin duda es de esos juegos que por más que pase el tiempo, no envejecen.
One of the greatest games I have ever played!! Thank you dear Valve team for this masterpiece of a game

 Gameplay: https://youtu.be/QjlFSg3TrQE

Ingredientes
todo en relación a la cantidad de unidades que quieran preparar
Milanesas
150g de queso mozzarella
150g de jamón cocido
Una lata de puré de tomate
Una cebolla
2 dientes de Ajo
2 hojas de Laurel fresco
Aceite
Sal
-Pimienta

Receta de milanesa napolitana paso a paso
Lo primero que vamos a hacer una vez que tengamos nuestras milanesas hechas (o compradas) es meterlas al horno 180º hasta que estén bastante cocidas. También las pueden freír si así lo desean. Procuren hacerlo con abundante aceite en la sartén y tengan en cuenta que esté bien caliente antes de meter las milanesas. Es más que nada para que éstas no absorban aceite de más. Una vez que las tenemos cocidas, las reservamos.

Para la salsa de tomate
Piquamos el ajo y la cebolla.
Calentamos una olla con aceite, ponemos el ajo y la cebolla dentro y esperamos que la cebolla se transparente.
Después, agregamos el puré de tomate y las dos hojas de laurel, deje cocinar por alrededor de 20 minutos.
Agregamos sal y pimienta a gusto.
Armado de la milanesa
Vamos colocar primero, por encima de nuestra milanesa, la salsa que acabamos de hacer.
Luego, colocamos unas fetas de jamón cocido
Finalmente, por encima, ponemos nuestro queso.
Así, las vamos a llevar al horno 180º hasta que se derrita el queso y chorree por los costados generando el efecto más hermoso y tentador del universo.
Al sacarlas podemos tirar por encima unas pizcas de orégano y ¡listo!
Publicado por Paulina cocina, el 30 de julio de 2019.

このゲームに出会えてよかった。

My expectations were that it would be an ego-shooter-esque puzzle game and i knew how the portals worked.
What i didnt expect was the level design and the multiple different and complex ways both the portals and the other components would be used. During playing I have expected that there would be more to it than just the regular 19 Levels however not that it would be this long and different to the rest of the game. Sadly I also knew that there was a "villain" in the game due to a YouTube thumbnail I saw but even without the prior knowledge it would become very obvious that not everything was going as it should be and I became more and more suspicious about the A.I.. The ending was thrilling because for me at least the timer was just about enough to figure out how to do it and to actually do it.
I also HAVE to give a shoutout to the sounddesign of this game. It perfectly captured the essence of the game and the loud eary sounds of the elevator made me feel uncomfortable every time I completed a level and gave me the feeling of not knowing what will happen next, how the level is going to look like and what challenges I would have to overcome. The voice of the A.I. not being symetrical on both sides of the headphones gave me a really weird but enjoyable feeling that kinda creeped me out and as a non-native of the english language made it harder for me to understand it which made me more concentrated while playing the level after.
I may not have played many games so far so take this with a grain of salt BUT this is deffinitly one of if not the best game I played and to ANYONE OUT THERE NOT KNOWING WETHER TO PLAY IT OR NOT. GO FOR IT!! The game is not expensive and if you think it will be to big of a time investement I can assure you its not. I played through it in 3 hours and you will probably take the same ammount of time.

And to the developers: Great job. This game is SO good and I cant wait to play Portal 2.

Si es de vuestro agrado los videojuegos de puzzles  en este encontrareis uno de los mas creativos e ingeniosos que he tenido oportunidad de probar ( personalmente un  imprescindible en el genero ) . Eso si , tened en cuenta que se trata de un juego corto , a mi me ha durado alrededor de 5 horas  ( no le resto merito porque valorando el conjunto es una duracion acertada y no os defraudara su conclusion , original como pocas he visto en este medio) dicha duracion puede ser  un factor que podeis considerar a la hora de decantaros por el a determinado precio a dia de hoy .

Very fun and innovative puzzle game. Not too hard, and it makes you feel really smart when you figure out the puzzles. I think that this game does a great job of not overextending itself with features; with the portal mechanic and stuff, it's good that it keeps it kind of simple. The only thing that I dislike about this game is that I couldn't blow up the rocket shooter.
